name: Universe Sandbox
descr:
Universe Sandbox is a realistic physics-based space simulator that allows you to create, destroy, and interact on an unimaginable scale.

It merges real-time gravity, climate, collision, and material interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet.

Universe Sandbox includes the desktop version and a VR mode with support for the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift+Touch, and Windows Mixed Reality.[h2]Simulate Gravity[/h2]N-body simulation at almost any speed using Newtonian mechanics. Real science, real physics, no supercomputer required. 
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Chaotic_System.jpg?t=1734381546[/img][h2]Collide Planets & Stars[/h2]Epic, mind blowing collisions of massive planetary bodies that leave behind molten craters.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Earth_and_Moon.png?t=1734381546[/img][h2]Create Your Own Systems[/h2]Start with a star, then add a planet. Spruce it up with moons, rings, comets, or even a black hole.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Create_Solar_Systems.jpg?t=1734381546[/img][h2]Model Planetary Climate[/h2]Watch sea ice grow and recede with the seasons because of a planet’s tilt - change the tilt and change the seasons. Or move planets close to a star and see the oceans boil away as the surface heats up. 
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Earth_and_Mars_Climate.png?t=1734381546[/img][h2]Supernova a Star[/h2]Watch a supernova unfold by colliding two stars, cranking up their mass, or making them explode at your whim.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Supernova.jpg?t=1734381546[/img][h2]Explore Historical Events[/h2]Hitch a ride with spacecraft including Juno and New Horizons, or view a total solar eclipse.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Eclipse.jpg?t=1734381546[/img][h2]Throw Planets in VR[/h2]Just grab and fling.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/VR.jpg?t=1734381546[/img][h2]And more...[/h2][list][li]Build and terraform planets with 12 materials, including water, oxygen, & carbon dioxide
[/li][li]Stellar flares & volatile trails
[/li][li]Procedurally generated planets, stars, & galaxies
[/li][li]Pulsars
[/li][li]Light-warping black holes
[/li][li]Epic space lasers
[/li][li]Shape oceans & mountains on planet surfaces
[/li][li]Spin planets apart with centrifugal force
[/li][li]Original soundtrack by Macoubre
[/li][li]Support for 20+ languages
[/li][li]Share & explore simulations on Steam Workshop[/li][/list][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/230290/extras/Juno.png?t=1734381546[/img]
